landing.bio: Currently pursuing a Masters in Cybersecurity from Michigan Technological University. I am an experienced full stack developer with expertise in Angular, .NET, and other technologies with 1.9 years of experience in the IT industry.

projects.name: Malicious Packact Filter
projects.about: I developed this project for CS4471. It is a packet filtering system that I developed in C++ that filters malicious IP addresses. It uses a random bloom filter to store a range of IP addresses generated by the user and check for malicious IP addresses specified by the user.

projects.name: Merkle Tree for Simple Payment Verification
projects.about: I developed this project for CS4471. It is a program that generates a Merkle tree with some transactions, stores its root value in one file and its branch values in another file, and checks if a particular transaction is present in the Merkle tree.

projects.name: Automatic HTML code generation from mock-up images using Neural Networks
projects.about: For my final year project, I have developed a tool that could be used for generating HTML code and hence basic web pages by taking a hand-drawn image of the webpage design as an input. I have trained a FasterRCNN model for detecting the position of different elements of a website in the input image and have written a python script for generating the desired HTML code. This project could help people who want to develop a simple website but do not have the required skill or resources for doing the same. It could also prove useful in bridging the gap between clients and developers.

projects.name: Complimentr Application Using Flask
projects.about: Complimentr is an flask App which uses Twilio's SMS API to send Compliment in the form of SMS to a desired phone number
